name: cloudinary.core
description: this is a script helper for cloudinary core project

scripts.build: dotnet restore && dotnet build src/Cloudinary.Core src/Cloudinary.Core.DependencyInjection src/Cloudinary.Core.Sync src/Cloudinary.Core.Html
scripts.pack: dotnet pack -o . -c Release src/Cloudinary.Core && dotnet pack -o . -c Release src/Cloudinary.Core.Sync  && dotnet pack -o . -c Release src/Cloudinary.Core.DependencyInjection && dotnet pack -o . -c Release src/Cloudinary.Core.Html

author: joelharkes
